title: Wächterin der Träume
description: Just as Dawn begins to understand her powers, a new terror is unleashed on unsuspecting mortals in Dark Side of Dawn , the latest book in the Nightmare Chronicles series from USA Today bestselling author Kathryn Smith. The fate of the world is on her shoulders, and it seems that the best she can hope for is not to die in her sleep . . .
author: Kathryn Smith
